event.title: Xmas social
event.description:
To mark the end of this year's meetups we'll be hosting a Xmas social event. They'll be  no set talks just a chance to grab a beer/wine or coke with a friendly bunch of mobile people from SW Mobile meetup. 

We'll cover a xmas drink or two and some nibbles (but defo recommend eating before hand) - Thanks to our group sponsors for making this possible. 

Space is limited, so please only RSVP if you can definitely make it. See you there, 

See you there, 

SW mobile organisers
